characterDescription:
Jerono is an officer in Amaram's army under a Herdazian general, who thinks he's a ridiculous little man.
After his general frees himself of the manacles with which he'd been restrained and hands them to Jerono, Jerono tells him that he thought he'd fail these ones for sure because the merchant from whom he'd purchased them claimed they were from the best Thaylen locksmiths.

characterDetails.Appearance: According to the general, Jerono has a too-wide smile, a flat nose, a missing tooth.
